alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:38PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RIPLEY AND NORTHERN DEARBORN COUNTIES... At 238 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milan, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Bright, Milan, Logan, Manchester, Sunman, St. Leon, Dover, Penntown, Weisburg, Lawrenceville, Interstate 74 at State Route 101 and New Alsace. This includes I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 155 and 167. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
